alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Gibson; Knox; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 20 at 7:47PM EDT until May 27 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Petersburg and Hazleton .Recent Rainfall across central Indiana will result in minor flooding along the white river. Additional Rainfall could produce higher crests. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Petersburg. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Lowland flooding begins to flood several Pike County roads. Many of the following county roads begin to flood around this level...east of SR 57 include CR 750N...CR 600N and CR 1000E. Pike county road subject to flooding west of SR 57 include...CR 250 W...CR 400W...CR 675N...CR 700 N...CR 1000w...CR 900W...CR 700W and CR 775W. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM EDT Friday /5:45 PM CDT Friday/ the stage was 14.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to 18.2 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
